@graph.name: Paleo Chocolate Chip Cookies - JoyFoodSunshine
@graph.description: Paleo chocolate chip cookies are perfectly soft & chewy, slightly crisp, and are the best paleo cookies you'll ever try!

acceptedAnswer.text:
Here are some options, but Hu Kitchen gems are my favorite!
Hu Kitchen Chocolate Gems. This is my favorite paleo chocolate. These gems are delicious and easy to toss into cookies (no bar chopping required).
Hu Kitchen Dark Chocolate Bars. You can also buy dark chocolate bars and chop them up to toss into these paleo chocolate chip cookies.
Lily's Dark Chocolate. They make chips and bars that are stevia sweetened, low carb, keto, etc.
Enjoy Life Foods Dark Chocolate Chips are a good option that are vegan, dairy-free but not fully paleo.

@graph.name: How do you keep cookies from getting hard after baking?

acceptedAnswer.text: Store them in an airtight container so they do not dry out.

@graph.name: Paleo Chocolate Chip Cookies
@graph.description: These paleo chocolate chip cookies are easy to make in under 20 minutes! They are perfectly soft & chewy, slightly crisp, and are seriously the best paleo cookies you’ll ever try!

video.name: Paleo Chocolate Chip Cookies
video.description: These paleo chocolate chip cookies are easy to make in under 20 minutes! They are perfectly soft & chewy, slightly crisp, and are seriously the best paleo cookies you’ll ever try! Dairy & grain-free!

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper and set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper and set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium-sized bowl, mix together almond flour, coconut flour, baking soda, salt and cinnamon. Set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: In a medium-sized bowl, mix together almond flour, coconut flour, baking soda, salt and cinnamon. Set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: In a microwave safe bowl, melt together coconut oil, cashew butter and honey. Cool completely.
recipeInstructions.name: In a microwave safe bowl, melt together coconut oil, cashew butter and honey. Cool completely.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix in coconut sugar until dissolved.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix in coconut sugar until dissolved.

recipeInstructions.text: Add egg and vanilla and stir until combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Add egg and vanilla and stir until combined.

recipeInstructions.text: Add dry ingredients and stir until combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Add dry ingredients and stir until combined.

recipeInstructions.text: Use a 1 ½ TBS cookie scoop to portion out dough, roll it into balls and place evenly spaced on a large cookie sheet.
recipeInstructions.name: Use a 1 ½ TBS cookie scoop to portion out dough, roll it into balls and place evenly spaced on a large cookie sheet.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 8-9 minutes until cookies are slightly browned.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake for 8-9 minutes until cookies are slightly browned.

recipeInstructions.text: Remove from oven. Gently tap the cookie sheet on the counter 2 times. Let the cookies cool on the pan for 15 minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.
recipeInstructions.name: Remove from oven. Gently tap the cookie sheet on the counter 2 times. Let the cookies cool on the pan for 15 minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

@graph.keywords: paleo chocolate chip cookie recipe, paleo chocolate chip cookies, paleo cookies
